name: Chuck Norris
content: Chuck Norris once kicked a horse in the chin. Its descendants are known today as Giraffes.

name: Chuck Norris
content: Chuck Norris had a staring contest with Medusa, and won.

name: Chuck Norris
content: When life hands Chuck Norris lemons, he makes orange juice.

name: Chuck Norris
content: When Chuck Norris goes on a picnic, the ants bring him food.

name: Chuck Norris
content: Chuck Norris gives Freddy Krueger nightmares.

name: Chuck Norris

name: Chuck Norris
content: Chuck Norris will never have a heart attack. His heart isn't nearly foolish enough to attack him.
